
## Decision Tree Analysis

This document provides a comprehensive and practical introduction to decision tree analysis. It covers the fundamental **aim of decision trees**, explains the underlying **principles** that govern their construction and interpretation, and discusses the **types of data formats** suitable for this method. In addition, the document highlights the **R packages** commonly used for implementing decision tree models and demonstrates their real world applications, with a particular focus on classification and prediction tasks related to loan eligibility.

This work was conducted as a group project involving four contributors, with the primary objective of building a solid understanding of decision tree analysis through both theoretical explanation and hands on application.
